attributes.action: One time release of 10% of private pension funds for funds over £50,000 value
attributes.additional_details: If pension funds can be released to people they might not take desperate loans out that cause later problems for them.
attributes.background: Change the age of pension equity release to under the age of 55 years for the duration of the covid crisis. But only a one off 10% on pensions of £50,000 or higher

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reduce restrictions on access to private pensions during coronavirus: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304996

Give all UK citizens access to their pension pots immediately tax free: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305886
